title: Trials of the Oath
goal: Kaelen must forge a new oath to replace the broken one.

scenes.summary: Kaelen and Lyra huddle in a cave, sharing their last warmth.
scenes.outcome: They admit their growing feelings for each other.

scenes.summary: Astra challenges Kaelen's worthiness to carry the shard.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen must face his guilt over his brother's fall.

scenes.summary: Kaelen enters a trance state where he speaks with the founders of his order.
scenes.outcome: He learns the order was founded on a lie of 'purity'.

scenes.summary: Kaelen rejects the old oath entirely, choosing a new one based on 'mercy'.
scenes.outcome: The shard transforms into a weapon: the Star-Blade.

scenes.summary: The blade's light warms the cave and points toward the final impact site.
scenes.outcome: They have a clear path to the endgame.

scenes.summary: They encounter a group of refugees who survived the city's fall.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen inspires them to fight back.

scenes.summary: Lyra organizes the refugees into a support unit using salvaged tech.
scenes.outcome: They now have a small army.

scenes.summary: They begin the trek toward the Rift of Souls.
